verses.verse: A songe of the stayres. Many a tyme haue they fought agaynst me fro my youth vp (maye Israel nowe saye.)
Yee, many a tyme haue they vexed me fro my youth vp, but they haue not preuayled agaynst me.
The plowers plowed vpon my backe, & made longe forowes.
But the ryghteous Lorde hath hewen the snares of the vngodly in peces.
Let them be confounded and turned backwarde, as many as haue euyll wyll at Sion.
Let them be euen as the grasse growynge vpon the house toppes, whych wythereth afore it be pluckte vp.
Wherof the mower fylleth not hys hande, nether he that byndeth vp the sheaues, hys bosome.
So that they whych go by, saye not so moche: as the Lorde prospere you, we wysh you good lucke in the name of the Lorde.
